Practical ML for Developing Countries Workshop @ ICLR 2021,
Learning under limited/low resource scenarios. Virtual.
iclr2021
HOME CfP DATES PAPERS ORGANIZERS

All papers accepted for PML4DC 2021 workshop are listed below.

The recorded parts of the workshop are stored at this ICLR's virtual site for the workshop.
Title Presentation Type Authors PDFs
Zero-shot spoken language understanding for English-Hindi: An easy victory against word order divergence spotlight Judith Gaspers (Amazon); Quynh Do (Amazon) pdf
Automated Detection of Food Water-Borne Parasites in Low Cost Smartphone Microscope Image spotlight Suprim Nakarmi (NAAMII); Retina Shretha (KIAS); Sanam Pudasaini (KIAS); Basant Giri (KIAS); Bishesh Khanal (NAAMII) pdf
Efficient Click-Through Rate Prediction for Developing Countries via Tabular Learning spotlight Joonyoung Yi (Hyperconnect); Buru Chang (Hyperconnect) pdf
Boosting Classification Accuracy of Fertile Sperm Cell Images leveraging cDCGAN poster Dipam Paul (Emory University ); Alankrita Tewari (KIIT University); Jiwoong Jeong (Emory University); Imon Banerjee (Emory University) pdf
Prediction of Tuberculosis using U-Net and segmentation techniques poster Dennis H Núñez-Fernández (Universidad Peruana Cayetano Heredia); Lamberto Ballan (University of Padova); Gabriel Jiménez Avalos (Universidad Peruana Cayetano Heredia); Jorge Coronel (Universidad Peruana Cayetano Heredia ); Patricia Sheen (Universidad Peruana Cayetano Heredia); Mirko Zimic (Universidad Peruana Cayetano Heredia)c pdf
Detection of COVID-19 Disease using Deep Neural Networks with Ultrasound Imaging poster Carlos Rojas-Azabache (Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos); Karen Vilca-Janampa (Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos ); Renzo Guerrero-Huayta (Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería); Dennis H Núñez-Fernández (Universidad Peruana Cayetano Heredia) pdf

Bambara Language Dataset for Sentiment Analysis poster Chayma Fourati (icompass) pdf
ANEA: Distant Supervision for Low-Resource Named Entity Recognition poster Michael A. Hedderich (Saarland University, Saarland Informatics Campus); Lukas Lange (Bosch Center for Aritificial Intelligence); Dietrich Klakow (Saarland University) pdf
Fairly Estimating Socioeconomic Status Under Costly Feature Acquisition (Poster Presentation) poster Ritika Brahmadesam (Ossining High School); Kush R Varshney (IBM Research) pdf
Computationally Accelerating Protein-Ligand Docking for Neglected Tropical Diseases: a case study on Drug Repurposing for Leishmaniasis poster Hassan Kane (MIT); Loïc Kwate Dassi (National School of Computer Science and Applied Mathematics of Grenoble); Ebenezer Nkwate (WL Research) pdf
Problem And Solution Documentation Template For Machine Learning Competitions To Enhance Explainability, Reproducibility, And Collaboration Between Stakeholders poster Oluwaseun Hamzat (Data Science Nigeria); Haleemah Oladosu (Data Science Nigeria) pdf
